Movember 2010: Favourite moustaches #9 - John Waters

Actually this is just a silly moustache really - less of a moustache and more of a bit of highlighting added to the top lip - fairly certain I couldn't actually do this... I wonder if he has a barber do it for him?



During November I'm growing a 'tache to raise money for prostate cancer - come sponsor me over here.
